template.template: Template Virt VMware Hypervisor standalone no discovery
template.name: Template Virt VMware Hypervisor standalone no discovery

item.name: Event log
item.description: Event log

item.name: Cluster name
item.description: Cluster name of the guest VM.

item.name: CPU usage
item.description: Aggregated CPU usage across all cores on the host in Hz. This is only available if the host is connected.

item.name: Datacenter name
item.description: Datacenter name of the hypervisor.

item.name: Full name
item.description: The complete product name, including the version information.

item.name: CPU frequency
item.description: The speed of the CPU cores. This is an average value if there are multiple speeds. The product of CPU frequency and number of cores is approximately equal to the sum of the MHz for all the individual cores on the host.

item.name: CPU model
item.description: The CPU model.

item.name: CPU cores
item.description: Number of physical CPU cores on the host. Physical CPU cores are the processors contained by a CPU package.

item.name: CPU threads
item.description: Number of physical CPU threads on the host.

item.name: Total memory
item.description: The physical memory size.

item.name: Model
item.description: The system model identification.

item.name: Bios UUID
item.description: The hardware BIOS identification.

item.name: Vendor
item.description: The hardware vendor identification.

item.name: Ballooned memory
item.description: The amount of guest physical memory that is currently reclaimed through the balloon driver. Sum of all guest VMs.

item.name: Used memory
item.description: Physical memory usage on the host.

item.name: Health state rollup
item.description: The host health state rollup sensor value: gray - unknown, ok, red - it has a problem, yellow - it might have a problem.

item.name: Overall status
item.description: The overall alarm status of the host: gray - unknown, ok, red - it has a problem, yellow - it might have a problem.

item.name: Uptime
item.description: System uptime.

item.name: Version
item.description: Dot-separated version string.

item.name: Number of guest VMs
item.description: Number of guest virtual machines.

item_prototype.name: Average read latency of the datastore $3
Average write latency of the datastore $3

graph_prototype.name: Average read latency of the datastore {#DATASTORE}

trigger.description: STATUS item has not been updated since 10 minutes.

trigger.name: VMware Hypervisor Overall status is not GREEN on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: The overall alarm status of the host: gray - unknown red - it has a problem yellow - it might have a problem.
